Chemotherapy.name: Chemotherapy
Chemotherapy.goal: Destroy cancer cells throughout the body
warnings: May cause severe nausea, vomiting, and fatigue.
Can suppress immune system; avoid crowded places and sick people.
Hair loss is common during treatment.
Increases risk of infection, bleeding, and anemia.
Requires regular blood tests to monitor side effects.
Report fever, bleeding, or mouth sores to your doctor immediately.
